articles.description: These were the Phillies' Winter Meetings, a two-day flurry in which the defending National League champions issued a statement of intent.
articles.content: SAN DIEGO Not four hours after Dave Dombrowski rested on a sofa on the seventh floor at the Manchester Grand Hyatt and said, I cant say we made any headway in the quest for a mid-rotation starter, th… [+6675 chars]

articles.title: “He's Still Tom Brady” - Rich Eisen on the Buccaneers' Thrilling Comeback Win vs Saints on MNF - The Rich Eisen Show
articles.description: Rich Eisen recaps Tom Brady’s latest comeback win as the G.O.A.T. led the Buccaneers to a Monday Night Football win over NFC South rival New Orleans Saints.T...
